website_summaries.verdict: Featuring a gigantic array of colors, a premium blend of lip-nourishing ingredients, and a rich pigment that feels great and looks even better, Vice Lipstick is easily Urban Decay’s must-own lipstick.
pros: Available in 49 colors, with metallic, matte, and satin finishes
Avocado oil and aloe vera soften lips
cons: The metallic finishes aren’t as bold as some of Urban Decay’s other offerings

customer_reviews.title: Brightens her whole look
customer_reviews.text: My daughters favorite! She looks beautiful when wearing this shade. Her hair is dk brown w/blonde hiltes, fair skin & blue eyes. She looks amazing in the Rush color!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only lipstick my wife will use.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this lipstick and it is hard to find here. When she does find it, it is expensive. Being able to save money by buying it online is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Wolford

customer_reviews.text: Love urban decay and this color is stunning but this lipstick snapped before I even finished applying it to my kids the first time I used the product. Maybe better off going through ulta ornsephora perhaps.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: the COLOR is vibrant and long-lasting, I love the MATTE type.
customer_reviews.text: I love this matte type, not shiny.... the color is perfect pink, I will order more soon.
customer_reviews.author: new remodel

customer_reviews.title: BEST COLOR EVER
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best colors ever; I get so many compliments on it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect red
customer_reviews.text: I am very fair skinned and red lipsticks are usually too much for me. But this red is perfect. I received so many compliments on it. I thought that it lasted well, too.
customer_reviews.author: M. Susan Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product and the company is very responsive. The order was received within 2 days of placing it, excellent customer service! Note, I have a beagle and he required a size 2. Easy to use, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Glace

customer_reviews.title: love this color
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for an *almost* black shade of lipstick. This was perfect. Very dark with violet undertones. ( :
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My package arrived just fine!! I have my lipstick and love it, the color is a true red, I love the name!!!!
customer_reviews.author: donna

customer_reviews.title: Excellent "winter red" lip stick
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous color, creamy texture, wears beautifully, no fading or running.
customer_reviews.author: Shopgirl

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier with this purchase. Beautiful matte red and long lasting! So happy that I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: RuthorDare

customer_reviews.title: New Favorite:)
customer_reviews.text: I used to have the shade "Broken" of this collection and it was my favorite lipstick, I never found one better, but it's no longer sold anywhere so I thought I'd try out this shade and it looks almost identical. This one is just little more pink when applied, which I don't mind at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Bummer.
customer_reviews.text: I have olive skin and this looks burgundy on me. Not red. Diss appointed. Didn’t pop at all
customer_reviews.author: 2points

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. The color may be considered a norm dark red but it is definitely a good winter red! I love urban decay lipsticks!
customer_reviews.author: Slholb1

customer_reviews.title: damaged product
customer_reviews.text: The product came rotten, a lot of drops of fat around and terrible smell of rancid oil. Fast shipping and delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tone!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lipstick. I’m 61 and am always hunting for the right muted tone and the medium brown is just perfect! It goes on smoothly and looks fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: Laura M

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this shade of color. Exactly what I was looking for. One of my favorites!
customer_reviews.author: Keshia Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: You can’t easily read it
customer_reviews.text: What were they thinking when they listed the ingredients in glossy grey on peach background. You can’t easily read it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M

product_meta.title: Urban Decay Vice Lipstick, Manic - Soft Wine with a Cream Finish - Unbelievable Color, Smooth Application, Hydrating Ingredients - 0.11 oz
product_meta.description: Color:Manic - Cream| Size:0.11 OunceIt is an innovative lip formula, in an array of shades and finishes, that gives an unbelievable laydown of color with just one swipe. Proprietary Pigment Infusion System gives the formula its super-creamy texture and superior color dispersion.
feature_bullets: GET HOOKED - Vice Lipstick comes in a massive lineup of shades and finishes—bold brights, dramatically dark hues, and super-versatile neutrals. With so much variety it’ll make your head spin, there’s something for everyone.

INDULGENT FINISHES - Our huge assortment of cruelty-free lip stick includes six finishes: Mega Matte, Comfort Matte, Cream, Metallized, Sheer & Sheer Shimmer. Manic is a Cream finish, with an ultra-creamy, luxe feel.

NOURISHING INGREDIENTS - A butter blend comforts, hydrates & enhances, leaving lips soft and conditioned. Aloe vera, jojoba, avocado & babassu oils nourish lips. Illipe butter adds long-lasting moisture. Vitamins C & E provide antioxidants.

PIGMENT INFUSION SYSTEM - Our Pigment Infusion System gives Vice Lipstick its super-creamy texture, rich payout and superior color dispersion. Just one swipe provides an unbelievable laydown of color, and every shade applies smoothly.

PLAYS WELL WITH OTHERS - Prime and define with our creamy, waterproof 24/7 Glide-On Lip Pencil, then follow with the matching shade of Vice Lipstick. The final result? A longer-lasting lip look with insane color payoff.
